text: Nándor Kóródi (born 15 August 1999) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays for Szeged-Csanád Grosics Akadémia on loan from Debreceni VSC. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Debrecen |- |2016–17 |1||0||0||0||–||–||1||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||1||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Balmazújváros |- |2018–19 |32||3||0||0||–||–||32||3 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||32||3||0||0||0||0||32||3 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="2" valign="top"|Career Total | |33||3||0||0||0||0||33||3 |} Updated to games played as of 19 May 2019. ==References== *MLSZ *Soccerway Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Szolnok Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Debreceni VSC players Category:Balmazújvárosi FC players Category:Szeged-Csanád Grosics Akadémia footballers Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság II players
title: Nándor Kóródi
